flowchart TD %% SOURCE DATA S1[hopital.csv] --> ST1[hopital table] S2[hopital_service.csv] --> ST2[hopital_services table] S3[medecins.csv] --> ST3[medecins table] %% STAGING DATABASE subgraph "Staging Database
chargement_des_donnees" ST1 ST2 ST3 end %% ETL PROCESS ST1 -->|ETL| DW1[dim_hopital] ST2 -->|ETL| DW3[dim_services
